title: Textile, 19th–20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry J. Bernheim
description: Long piece of black cotton batik-printed with two repeats of blue-bordered square enclosing rows of triangles, stylized floral, and other traditional batik motifs. In reserved white, tan, brown, and blue.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th–20th century.
19th–20th century. Medium: cotton
